excerpt: The TMC2160 is a high-power stepper motor driver IC with SPI interface. It features industries’ most advanced stepper motor driver with simple Step/Dir interface.Using external transistors, highly dynamic, high torque drives can be realized. Based on Trinamic's sophisticated SpreadCycle and StealthChop choppers, the driver ensures absolutely noiseless operation combined with maximum efficiency and best motor torque. High integration, high energy efficiency and a small form factor enable miniaturized and scalable systems for cost effective solutions.The fully compatible TMC5160 offers an additional motion controller to make stepper motor control even easier.Special Featuresmicrostep tableMicroPlyer™CoolStep™passive brakingshort detectionSpreadCycle™Stall detectionStallGuard2™StealthChop2™

Quality: Statement concerning RoHS compliance of TMC2160
